entry.title: Crater Lake Blanketed by 17 Inches of Fresh Snow, Total Snowpack Reaches 117 Inches
entry.summary: Crater Lake National Park, renowned for its stunning deep-blue waters and dramatic winter landscapes, has been transformed into a snowy wonderland after receiving 17 inches of fresh snow in the past 24 hours. This latest snowfall has pushed the total snow depth at the park to an impressive 117 inches,

entry.title: ROSEBURG SEES BELOW NORMAL RAINFALL FOR JANUARY
entry.summary: February 1, 2025 1:00 p.m. Roseburg had a below normal amount of rainfall for the month of January. Data from the National Weather Service said the Roseburg Regional Airport measured 2.52 inches of precipitation. That compares with the normal monthly amount which is 4.82 inches. Just over a quarter of January’s rain in Roseburg fell...

entry.title: Egg prices are soaring, and Oregon’s among the states hardest hit. Here's Why
entry.summary: The ongoing bird flu outbreak continues to wreak havoc on the U.S. poultry industry, forcing farmers to cull millions of chickens each month. As a result, egg prices have soared, more than doubling in many areas since the summer of 2023. With Easter on the horizon, demand for eggs
